```{r}
library(tidyverse)
energy_data <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/patrickgeorge12/stat-331-PA6/main/eg_fec_rnew_zs.csv?token=GHSAT0AAAAAAB7QPSEMH2S7T5CZUXWVNB2MZACNTFA")
co2_data <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/patrickgeorge12/stat-331-PA6/main/yearly_co2_emissions_1000_tonnes.csv?token=GHSAT0AAAAAAB7QPSEMYFU7UWS37WTQM6PKZACNU6A")
```

```{r}
energy_data_piv <- energy_data |>
  pivot_longer(cols = !country,
               names_to = "year",
               values_to = "Percent_Consumption")
co2_data_piv <-co2_data |>
  select(country, X1989:X2017) |> 
    pivot_longer(cols = !country,
               names_to = "year",
               values_to = "1000_metric_tonnes")
merged_data <- left_join(co2_data_piv, energy_data_piv)
```
